body.name: Dash Cam, Dash Camera for Cars, 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside 1080P with Night Vision, G-Sensor, Parking Monitor 1S Recording, Loop Recording Car Camera with 32G SD Card
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 2 hrs 17 mins
features: 【3 Channel Dash Cam】Gloryes dash cam front and rear inside provides 1080P camera. Wide-angle shot for front (170°) and rear (150°) and inside (150°) .The screen of the 3 channel dash cam uses an IPS panel that allows you to see clearly at any angle without reflections or blurring. Dashcams can record most of the conditions inside and outside of the car. The length of the connecting cable for the rear camera is 5.5-6 metres suitable for Uber, cars and vans. NO WIFI, NO GPS

【Parking Monitor 1S Recording】We constantly analyze the needs of our customers. And we deep improving the details of our products and realize the technical innovation. Gloryes dash cams can skip boot up and shoot directly within 1 second after vibration. The 3 channel dash cam front and rear inside records and locks the captured video in time. This feature of the dual dash cam front and inside will better protect your personal and property safety.

【Night Vision & WDR】There are 4 infrared LEDs around the dashcam front and rear camera to provide good night vision even in dark conditions, ensuring a clear recording of what's going on inside the car. The WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) feature of dash cams automatically optimizes the quality of the video for day/night recordings.

【Loop Recording & G-Sensor】When the SD card of car dash camera is full, the new video will overwrite the oldest video. This dash camera for cars front and rear has a built-in G sensor, when the car is hit, the video will be automatically locked and retained without being overwritten by normal video.

【Thoughtful Accessories】The dashcam front and rear camera is eqquipped with TWO Mounts ( Suction Mount and Adhesive Mount). There are also spare adhesive stickers, dustproof stickers (so that the adhesive sticker more firmly on your car) for interior car camera, and auxiliary mounting rods to make installation easier. 32G memory card is included for your daily recording needs. Gloryes dash cam is the perfect Christmas gift for friends and family!

【Dash Cams with Hidden Design】Unique compact designed car camera, Gloryes dash cam front and rear inside with a tiny size won't shade your view or distract you while driving. The front camera can be easily installed on the windshield and connected to a power source. If you need a simple and high-quality dash camera, Gloryes dash cams are a great choice!

【Flip Horizontally】The cabine camera of this dash camera has developed the exclusive functions, which can provide you with mirror flips of the video. You can adjust it according to your situation.（Need to contact custermer service to get upgrade software if you need this function.）

【Professional After-sale Service】We provide 7*24 technical support-respond within 12 hours.You can send messages to our customer service email if you have any questions. We will do our best to solve the problem for you. If you need some specific features such as reverse the inside video, we will send you new software for update.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: No WiFi No GPS 1. Sometimes the APP cannot connect. 2. Even if it is connected, the transmission is too slow and the transmission distance needs to be very close is susceptible to interference. Disconnect the driving recorder and need to reconnect. 3. When some mobile phones are connected to the dash cam, they cannot connect to WiFi, which sometimes affects the inability to receive other information from the mobile phone. Compared to some dash cams with short WIFI transmission distance (3-5m) and long connection time transmission time, maybe the traditional transmission method of dash cam is a better choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First dash cam, great value for money.
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised how good the quality of its photos and videos are. This is the first dash cam I have bought . It meets my expectations of a dash camera perfectly. However, the instruction manual was not comprehensive and I asked Gloryes customer service team to get the complete instructions on how to operate it. They are very professional and patient and will do their best to solve my problem! Thanks again!Clear videosThis dash cam takes videos at 1080p resolution and you can see the front licence plate very clearly during the day and at night. The rear camera is also clearer and works fine in the rain.Easy to operateConnects to power and automatically turns on to record video.1.Press the power off button to pause recording.M button to enter the setting interface, up and down button to select, power off button to confirm.2.Pause the recording, long press the M button to enter the photo mode. In photo mode, long press the M button to enter the video playback interface.3. Under the pause recording situation, press up and down key to switch the combination of shooting lenses. If you have all three lenses installed, there will be 4 combination forms here, Front Camera, Front+Rear, Front+Inside, Picture in Picture (taken by three cameras)4. After a minute of automatically recording video it will go into screen saver mode, this can be done in two ways, one is a completely black screen and the other is a screen saver mode that keeps time. If you don't want to use the screen saver feature, you can go to settings and find screensaver and select off.Simple and compactThis dash cam is relatively small and fits nicely in my car not blocking the view at all. It's really friendly to first time car camera buyers like me. The buttons are on the right side which is also nice to operate. My friend's car recorder has the buttons on the side and she doesn't find it as easy to operate as mine.Mirroring functionTheir customer service team also provided me with updated software to flip the video horizontally as my request.Overall, I am very happy with this camera and think it is a great value for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cost-effective Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: It turned out to be a very decent product for the money paid: pretty compact, easy to install, and quite high-quality video (well, it is noticeably better during daylight hours but even at night it is acceptable).The best - it's a complete kit, which includes a 32GB SD card and rearview camera so I could install it all at once and forget about wasting more time shopping. Also for the rear camera, I recommend having a professional and electrical automotive worker do the work for you.We'll see how it will behave in the future and how long it will last - but as for now, considering the price, recommended as an amazing bang for the buck!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for money
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased and installed a dashcam on my car and it is easy to install and works well. The picture quality is very good, as it says. Connecting to the phone to view and save is not a problem. It is highly recommended for anyone who comes into contact with a dashcam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This camera is about what I expected it to be for the price. That's not a terrible thing but there's definite room for improvement. This is a somewhat rudimentary dashcam with features you'd expect - records from a forward facing camera, rear facing camera and an optional back up camera. I didn't install the backup camera as I didn't want to drill a hole through the back of my car. This comes with a micro-SD card, the camera, short and long power cords, backup camera and attached cabling. It also has a mount with double-side tape and anti-static stickers to mount in a more permanent fashion as well as a suction cup mount. I used the suction cup mount and mounted it toward the top & center of my windshield, then used the provided tool to hide the long power cable behind the trim, along the windshield and while some of it sticks out across the dash... it's still a fairly clean install. Once I turned it on, there are a few things to set up - language, date, time, etc... Once I was done with that, I turned it off. I started my car and it powered back up and almost immediately started recording. After a few adjustments to how the camera was sitting, I was off and drove around my block to test it out. The video was clear and really does have a wide angle on the front and rear-facing cameras. It captured oncoming traffic and was able to see vehicles and people on the side of the road. It probably goes without saying but records audio, as well.So, yes, it does everything I expected it to and seems to do it well. I gave a 4 star review for the simple reason there could have been a few simple things added to improve it. First - no micro-SD card adapter so if you want to play back or transfer any of the recorded files you will have to find an adapter. Also, the adjustments for angle off the mount could be finer; it kind of locks itself in to a slots that have a lot of room in between where the camera would be perfect but as it sits, it's just okay. Lastly, the keys are very small and it's difficult to see what you're pressing from the driver's seat. It almost makes you remove the camera from the mount in order to change settings or play back a file. Otherwise, it's fine and will serve the purpose for which it was designed. I like it and if someone were looking for an inexpensive dashcam, I'd recommend this one but make sure you have a microSD adapter and some patience for the installation and usage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a good Dashcam
reviews.reviewText: This dash cam system was very easy to install and came with everything needed to install. It looks great mounted on the windshield and is very minimalistic (doesn't distract from driving). Formatting the SD card is a little tricky but once you get it formatted on the camera and your PC, you'll be good to go.Excellent picture quality. Plus we have fun when on a road trip going back and looking at part of the drive. It's pretty cool to see. I don't normally save them, unless there was something we wanted to see again.All in all, it's a great system and perfect for someone who is installing a dash cam for the first time.
